articles.title: DPRK Women's Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Delegation Leaves  
   Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Democratic Women's Union led by Chairwoman of its Central Committee Pak Sun Hui left here today to visit Vietnam, Laos and Cambodia.
